comment.author: 52034226@N08
comment._content: Is this really from the year 1907-08? The destroyer in the background looks like World War I design or later...

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content:
Hi Foxman,

Thanks for your question.

According to our information the scout cruiser 'Adventure' was launched in 1904 which makes the 1907-08 date possible. 

Lucinda

comment.author: 52034226@N08
comment._content: Thank you for confirmation. It is much appreciated.
